headline.main: Sherwood Believes Villa Have Turned Corner
headline.print_headline: Sherwood Believes Villa Have Turned Corner

docs.snippet: Tim Sherwood believes Aston Villa may have turned the corner  after sweeping Sunderland aside 4-0 on Saturday and moving clear of the Premier League relegation zone....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tim Sherwood believes Aston Villa may have turned the corner  after sweeping Sunderland aside 4-0 on Saturday and moving clear of the Premier League relegation zone.

headline.main: Mariners Infielder Taylor Out 4-6 Weeks With Broken Wrist
headline.print_headline: Mariners Infielder Taylor Out 4-6 Weeks With Broken Wrist

docs.snippet: Seattle Mariners infielder Chris Taylor is expected to miss four to six weeks because of a broken right wrist....
docs.lead_paragraph: Seattle Mariners infielder Chris Taylor is expected to miss four to six weeks because of a broken right wrist.

headline.main: At Least 10 Americans Being Flown to U.S. After Possible Ebola Exposure
headline.print_headline: At Least 10 Americans Being Flown to U.S. After Possible Ebola Exposure

docs.snippet: At least 10 Americans possibly exposed to the deadly Ebola virus were being flown to the United States from Sierra Leone for observation, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: At least 10 Americans possibly exposed to the deadly Ebola virus were being flown to the United States from Sierra Leone for observation, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said on Saturday.

headline.main: In New Hampshire, Jeb Bush Goes 'Up Close and Personal'
headline.print_headline: In New Hampshire, Jeb Bush Goes 'Up Close and Personal'

docs.snippet: Republican Jeb Bush's initial foray into New Hampshire has shown that he may have learned from the mistakes his father and brother made in losing the state that will be crucial for him should he run for president in 2016....
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican Jeb Bush's initial foray into New Hampshire has shown that he may have learned from the mistakes his father and brother made in losing the state that will be crucial for him should he run for president in 2016.

docs.snippet: Alex Rodriguez heard it from both sides Saturday....

headline.main: Kurdish officials say Islamic State fighters used chlorine gas
headline.sub: Kurdish officials say Islamic State fighters used chlorine gas

docs.snippet: Iraqi Kurdish authorities say they have evidence that Islamic State fighters used chlorine gas against peshmerga fighters. Gavino Garay reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Iraqi Kurdish authorities say they have evidence that Islamic State fighters used chlorine gas against peshmerga fighters. Gavino Garay reports.

headline.main: Villa Kid Joins Elite Band of 16-Year-Old Debutants
headline.print_headline: Villa Kid Joins Elite Band of 16-Year-Old Debutants

docs.snippet: Young Aston Villa striker Rushian Hepburn-Murphy joined an elite band of 16-year-olds to play in the Premier League when he came on as a late substitute in the 4-0 win at Sunderland on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Young Aston Villa striker Rushian Hepburn-Murphy joined an elite band of 16-year-olds to play in the Premier League when he came on as a late substitute in the 4-0 win at Sunderland on Saturday.

headline.main: Would-Be 2016 Republican Candidate Walker Makes First New Hampshire Trip
headline.print_headline: Would-Be 2016 Republican Candidate Walker Makes First New Hampshire Trip

docs.snippet: Wisconsin Governor Scott Walker brought his message of limited government to New Hampshire on Saturday in his first visit to the state as a prospective Republican Party presidential candidate in 2016....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wisconsin Governor Scott Walker brought his message of limited government to New Hampshire on Saturday in his first visit to the state as a prospective Republican Party presidential candidate in 2016.

headline.main: Bolt Cruises to Win in 400 Meters Race
headline.print_headline: Bolt Cruises to Win in 400 Meters Race

docs.snippet: Jamaican Olympic sprint champion Usain Bolt cruised to victory in his first individual race of the season, clocking 46.37 seconds over 400 meters at the GC Foster Classic in Kingston on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jamaican Olympic sprint champion Usain Bolt cruised to victory in his first individual race of the season, clocking 46.37 seconds over 400 meters at the GC Foster Classic in Kingston on Saturday.

headline.main: Airliner Lands Safely in Denver After Blowing Tire on Takeoff
headline.print_headline: Airliner Lands Safely in Denver After Blowing Tire on Takeoff

docs.snippet: A United Airlines turboprop plane landed safely after it returned to Denver International Airport on Saturday when the Kansas City-bound flight blew a tire on takeoff, officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A United Airlines turboprop plane landed safely after it returned to Denver International Airport on Saturday when the Kansas City-bound flight blew a tire on takeoff, officials said.
